thread.section_title: zChocolat Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of zChocolat | www.zchocolat.com
thread.title: Dwitiya Ghosh

author: Dwitiya Ghosh
title: Dwitiya Ghosh
text: I have purchased chocolates from zChocolat for many years now, and never experienced any problems. The packaging is not only done with great care and quality, its aesthetics has always been a highlight for the recipients. My friends and family have enjoyed the lovely chocolates, and I have been extremely pleased with the responsiveness and excellent customer service. Even with customs factored in, the zChocolat team and Concierge service have ensured timely delivery combined with prompt and polite communication. I would recommend this to everyone!
